extension.summary: Un habillage minimaliste basé sur des lignes
extension.description: Arctic Fuse is a minimalist row based skin providing a vertical quick nav menu and customisable widgets
Arctic Fuse est un hablillage minimaliste basé sur des lignes offrant un menu vertical pour une navigation rapide ainsi que des widgets personnalisables

extension.summary: Klar, minimalistisch, elegant, einfach, leicht. Basiert auf dem original Arctic: Zephyr Skin von jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Clean, minimal, elegant, simple, light. Based on the original Arctic: Zephyr skin by jurialmunkey.
Limpio, minimalista, elegante, simple, ligero. Basado en el original Arctic: Zephyr skin por jurialmunkey.
Clair, minimaliste, élégant, simple et léger. Basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr par jurialmunkey.
Net, minimal, élégant, simple, léger. Basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr par jurialmunkey.
Švari, minimali, elegantiška, paprasta, lengva. Basato sull'originale Arctic: Zephyr skin di jurialmunkey.
Schoon, minimaal, elegant, simpel, licht. Gebaseerd op de originele Arctic: Zephyr skin door jurialmunkey.
Prosta, minimalista, elegancka i lekka. Na podstawie oryginalnego skinu Arctic: Zephyr autorstwa jurialmunkey.
Curat, minimalist, elegant, simplu, ușor. Bazat pe pielea originală Arctic: Zephyr de jurialmunkey.
Опрятный, минималистичный, элегантный, простой, светлый. Основано на оригинальном скине Arctic: Zephyr от jurialmunkey.
extension.description: Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded basiert auf dem original Arctic: Zephyr Skin von jurialmunkey und ist ein minimalistisches, klares und simples Interface für deine Medien mit dem gewissen Etwas.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded is based on original Arctic: Zephyr skin, created by jurialmunkey. Arctic focuses on being simple, clean and minimalistic with a light spin.
Arctic: Zephyr - Reloaded est basé sur le skin original Arctic: Zephyr, créé par jurialmunkey. Arctic se focalise sur le fait d'être simple, claire et minimaliste.

Gaia and its developers do not create, host, or distribute any of the content displayed in the addon. Gaia simply searches publicly available sources for content. Gaia is, and always will be, free and open-source. None of its code or resources may be sold or redistributed for commercial purposes.

Orion is a system for caching search and scraping results for later reuse. Metadata and links on Orion are maintained by the community. Searches are cached so that subsequent users can quickly access the results without having to go through a lengthy scraping process themselves. The Orion Kodi addon does not provide any search or playback features, but it can easily be integrated into any other addon, website, or standalone program with minimal effort.
extension.disclaimer: Orion does not create, host, or distribute any files or videos. Orion is a caching service providing low-level API access to a community-maintained storage of textual data. All metadata and links available through Orion are scraped, processed, and submitted by community users. Due to the volume, velocity, and complexity of the data, Orion cannot inspect or validate the content submitted by users. Data on Orion may therefore be inaccurate, out-dated, or in other ways unusable. Orion does not guarantee the validity or integrity of the data available through its API and does not take liability for any of the data submitted by its users. Users take the risk and are responsible for the manner in which they utilize the Orion API.

extension.description: This is a simple repo for all of RACC's tvOne IPTV add-ons (Kodi 19 and up)[CR]After seeing so many versions and forks out there I wanted to provide a location for the original latest updated versions. These are taken directly from RACC's Japanese Repository and slightly modified with an icon, fanart and a date updated tag in the description. Developers are welcome to import this into their own repos. - tvOne pulls from TV-Tap and was updated Oct 2024 - tvOne-111 pulls from Redbox and was updated Oct 2024 - tvOne-1112 pulls from LiveNet and was updated Oct 2024 - tvOne-112 pulls from RStv and was updated July 2023 - tvOne-11 pulled from SwiftStreams but is dead so it's not included here
